text: Eduard Reingoldovich Rapp (, born 7 March 1951) is a retired Soviet cyclist who mostly competed on track in the 1 km time trial. In this event he won five medals at the world championships in 1971–79Eduard Rapp. cyclingarchives.com and placed eighth at the 1972 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:Living people Category:Soviet male cyclists Category:Olympic cyclists of the Soviet Union Category:Cyclists at the 1972 Summer Olympics Category:Cyclists at the 1976 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Omsk
title: Eduard Rapp
